lead_paragraph: A young math genius sees logic thwarted by one truly baffling equation: love.Teenage math prodigy Nathan (Asa Butterfield) struggles when it comes to building relationships with other people, not least with his mother, Julie (Sally Hawkins).
snippet: A young math genius sees logic thwarted by one truly baffling equation: love.Teenage math prodigy Nathan (Asa Butterfield) struggles when it comes to building relationships with other people, not least with his mother, Julie (Sally Hawkins).
